name: Eisenhower Matrix Priority Engine
author: ACME Corp
description: Priority scoring based on the Eisenhower Matrix - categorizes tasks by urgency and importance into four quadrants

urgency_deadline_hours.title: Urgency Deadline (hours)
urgency_deadline_hours.description: Tasks due within this many hours are considered urgent

importance_priority_threshold.title: Importance Priority Threshold
importance_priority_threshold.description: User-assigned priority at or below this value is considered important (1=highest)

quadrant_weights.title: Quadrant Weights
quadrant_weights.description: Base score weights for each Eisenhower quadrant

schedule.title: Schedule (Q2)
schedule.description: Weight for Important, Not Urgent tasks

delegate.title: Delegate (Q3)
delegate.description: Weight for Urgent, Not Important tasks

eliminate.title: Eliminate (Q4)
eliminate.description: Weight for Not Urgent, Not Important tasks

deadline_bonus_enabled.title: Enable Deadline Bonus
deadline_bonus_enabled.description: Add bonus score as deadline approaches within urgent threshold

blocking_bonus_weight.title: Blocking Bonus Weight
blocking_bonus_weight.description: Extra score per task that this task is blocking
